posts.post_content:
Looking to Trade Or Sell My t207 Turkey Mike Donlin Broad leaf back. 

Very pretty card that is crease free, and would have been graded quite nicely if not for the lower boarder trim. 

I bought a better ruler yesterday and the card measures as follows: 
The left border is 2 and 10/16ths, and the right is 2 and 9.8/16ths... Top and bottom measure 1 and 7/8ths across.

If your interested, please make an offer, I am also totally open to trades (and will chip in cash for the right item)

Looking for the following
*Ty Cobb T206 Bat Off (ideally looking for low grade to match up with the others I have) 
*Unusual Ted Williams Memorabilia (also looking for 1940-41 playballs)
*higher end Hall of fame autograph stuff (preferably flats)

PM me if interested

Many Thanks ! 
Dave

PS-Sorry for the scans, my computer is acting funny

[quote name="daves_resale_shop" post=1315821]Looking to Trade Or Sell My t207 Turkey Mike Donlin Cycle Back. 

...
PS-Sorry for the scans, my computer is acting funny[/QUOTE]

Its acting so funny it changed the back from a Cycle to a Broadleaf!  :)
I had cycle in my head from the other donlin thread... Sorry guys, as you can see it is a BROADLEAF back

Couldn't get a deal struck... 

Card has been moved to ebay...
Card ends in a few hours. Looking forward to it landing in hands that will appreciate it more than I!
Somehow I can't find it now-
